com.mygdx.elmaze.networking

Class NetworkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.elmaze.networking.NetworkManager

  • public class NetworkManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Class that manages all application server side networking

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static NetworkManager getInstance()
        Returns:
        Singleton's class instance

      • getIPAddress

        public java.lang.String getIPAddress()
        Returns:
        Server's running IP address

      • startServer

        public boolean startServer(int maxNumClients)
        Starts the server by creating a server socket. Launches a SocketManager class instance that waits and handles new connections in a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        maxNumClients - Maximum number of clients the server can attend at a time
        Returns:
        Returns true if the server creation is successful, false otherwise (no Internet connection)

      • closeServer

        public void closeServer()
        Creates the running server

      • getParsedIP

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getParsedIP()
        Parses the server's running IP address into an hexadecimal digit linked list
        Returns:
        Returns parsed IP address

      • getSocketManager

        public SocketManager getSocketManager()
        Returns:
        Returns server socket manager
